detaileddescription.para: spi/sdio bufferï¼ŒWraper controller can only access the address after the 0x60000
Definition of SDIO interrupt in the system

briefdescription.para: This function is used to initial HSPI register.

simplesect.para: When the system is initialized, the function has been called, so users can not call this function.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to enable or disable user mode.

simplesect.para: If the user enables the user mode, RICM instruction in the system will not be used by SPI. If the user wants to use the SPI interface as other use, need to enable the user mode. This function must be called before the register function.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to set high speed interface type.

parameterdescription.para: is the interface type. HSPI_INTERFACE_SPI or HSPI_INTERFACE_SDIO

briefdescription.para: This function is used to register hspi rx command interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: is the hspi rx interrupt call back function.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to register hspi rx data interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: is the hspi rx interrupt call back function.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to register hspi tx data interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: is the hspi tx interrupt call back function.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to transfer data.

parameterdescription.para: is a buf for saving user data.
